input: Tell me a paragraph bio of Huang Xing.

Remembered as one of the founding fathers of modern China, Huang Xing is hailed as a national hero and respected figure in Chinese history, known for his unwavering commitment to the cause of revolution and his legacy as a dedicated and fearless patriot who played a key role in China's transition from imperial rule to republican government.
